JOB DESCRIPTION:
Senior Software Developer /  Bhubaneswar Apply Now 

Job Description 

We are looking for a well- experienced Software Developer to handle our varied application development projects.

Desired Skills & Experience We are looking for a qualified Senior Software Developer with experience in developing large web applications,  portals and e- commerce solutions with a rich technology skillset in LAMP and MEAN stacks. The candidate should have a minimum experience of 3 years in building rich media web applications integrated with mobile and web services.

Mandatory Technical Skillsets: LAMP and MEAN Stack deployments.

Additional Desired Skillsets: Node.js,  React.js,  Ruby and Python.

As a Senior Developer,  you have the opportunity to work on challenging global projects and grow to the top leadership of the organization. The current position is at our Chennai office and is a full- time permanent position.

What we offer 

Remuneration commensurate with experience and ample opportunities to work on a variety of global projects.

Step 1: 

Email us your profile along with links to the apps you have worked on.
